title: The Star Maiden
description: What if powerful immortals existed and they wanted you? Three unearthly brothers bestowed with powers beyond human comprehension are coming to the human world. One romantic, one narcissist and one dangerous. The three of them seek a human girl who they entwine with a veil of seduction, deceit and treachery. But why do they truly seek her ?Tilly Rose an eighteen year old human girl has had visions as a child that reveals clues about a noble past….. a past hinting of a future, that will take her on a frightening journey. As she struggles to separate truth from lies, in a realm filled with dangerous secrets and alluring mysteries, she is presented with a frightening choice….. What if making that choice would sacrifice her soul? Was she ready to meet her fate?
author: M.J. Melrose
